mapper.insert: insert into purchaseOrder (poCode, materialCode, materialName, materialPrice, poCount, poPrice, poDate, payDate, cusName, poOwner, poStatus) values(#{poCode},#{materialCode},#{materialName},#{materialPrice},#{poCount},#{poPrice},#{poDate},#{payDate},#{cusName},#{poOwner},#{poStatus})
mapper.select: select * from purchaseOrder where poStatus != '삭제됨' order by poCode desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
